title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Seeking a skilled frontend developer with 5+ years of React and Node.js experience to build next-gen web applications.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are looking for a creative UI/UX designer to join our team and help design intuitive and beautiful user interfaces.

title: Junior Backend Engineer
description: Entry-level position for a backend engineer. Knowledge of Python (Django/Flask) and SQL databases is required.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead our product development teams, define product roadmaps, and work closely with stakeholders to deliver value.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage our CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and ensure the reliability of our cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP).

title: Marketing Intern
description: A great opportunity for students to learn about digital marketing, SEO, and content creation in a fast-paced environment.
